headline: Stock Market Sell-Off: 2 Dirt Cheap Stocks To Buy Now
summary: The Trump administration's tariff announcement on April 2 served as a stark reminder of this concept as it sent global equities into a tailspin.  Regardless of the potential viability of Trump's plan to bring manufacturing jobs back to the U.S., the administration's unpredictable decisions could put a shadow over the economy for months or even years.  Let's explore why Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ: SMCI) and Dollar Tree (NASDAQ: DLTR) could make excellent long-term bets.
